# ns_npa_publisher_upgrade_profiles (Data Source)

NPAPublisherUpgradeProfiles DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ns_npa_publisher_upgrade_profiles" "my_npapublisherupgradeprofiles" {
  external_id = 1
}
```
